snippet: The federal judiciary said Tuesday that it would close the courthouses because of inadequate financing from Congress and the prospect of more drastic cuts.
abstract: Judicial Conference of the United States says it will close six courthouses in the South because of inadequate financing from Congress and the prospect of more drastic cuts.
lead_paragraph: The federal judiciary said Tuesday that it would close the courthouses because of inadequate financing from Congress and the prospect of more drastic cuts.

keywords.value: Judicial Conference of the United States
keywords.name: organizations
